New Records: England scored their lowest ODI all-out total of 85-5 in Bengaluru against Sri Lanka
Key Match Events: England's batting collapse led to a 229-run defeat
Ben Stokes was the only batter to score over 40
Pre-Game Insights: England needed to perform well after a previous loss to South Africa
Post-Match Reflections: The performance received heavy criticism from the cricket community
Miscellaneous Highlights: England's 85-5 dismissal is the lowest fifth-wicket score in a World Cup match since 1975
